name: Film School Simulator Build 2.0
description:
This is a work in progress build for Film School Simulator, an interactive narrative for Google Cardboard VR. You play the role as a starry eyed film student who's finally been given his big break. Your semi-famous film teacher, Jean DeRequetór, has given you $600 to make your first movie! Figure out yourself the ins and outs of this crazy business through Casting Offices, Prop Houses, and real Hollywood studios! 

This is a work in progress developer build meant to showcase the the functional mechanics of the experience using developer assets. In the full version there will be updated locations, characters, and lighting. As you play focus on what you understand and what you don't, not the aesthetics.

The game is played using Gaze Controls in VR, but for this demo, just hold down the ALT key to control where you look. Begin the game by going to various locations by looking at the options on the table. There is a chalkboard behind you in the main room that will inform you what you have completed, and what you need to. Don't forget to keep an eye out behind you!

And if you're playtesting, make sure to fill out this Response Form so we can improve the experience!
